entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: WSW 58 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie early in the evening. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
